articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
Current position:  I’m a research fellow at the University of Milano - Bicocca since January 2021.
Research interests:  I work mainly on spatial and spatio-temporal models for data on linear networks (such as car crashes or ambulance interventions). Get the complete curriculum vitae from here.
Email:  andrea.gilardi@unimib.it
Present Address:  University of Milano-Bicocca, Department of Economics, Management and Statistics, Piazza dell’Ateneo Nuovo 1, 20126 Milano, Italy.

articles.title: Andrea Gilardi
articles.contents:
Andrea Gilardi
          Home
          
          
          Talks & Side Projects
          About me
          Twitter
          
          
          
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Andrea Gilardi
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            Hi! I’m Andrea Gilardi and I’m a research fellow at the University of Milano - Bicocca. I work mainly on spatial and spatio-temporal models on linear networks. Love hiking and coding with R.
            
            Main publications
            Gilardi, A., Borgoni, R., Presicce, L., Mateu, J., Measurement Error Models for Spatial Network Lattice Data: Analysis of Car Crashes in Leeds. Under review. Preprint;
            Gilardi, A., Borgoni, R., Mateu, J., A non-separable first-order spatio-temporal intensity for events on linear networks: an application to ambulance interventions. Under review. Preprint.
            Gilardi, A., Lovelace, R., Padgham, M. Data structures and methods for reproducible street network analysis: overview and implementations in R. Under review. Preprint.
            Gilardi, A., Mateu, J., Borgoni, R., Lovelace, R., Multivariate hierarchical analysis of car crashes data considering a spatial network lattice. Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series A (Statistics in Society). http://doi.org/10.1111/rssa.12823.
            Borgoni, R., Gilardi, A., & Zappa, D. (2020). Assessing the Risk of Car Crashes in Road Networks. Social Indicators Research, 1-19.https://doi.org/10.1007/s11205-020-02295-x.
            
            
            Software
            I’m the author of two R packages published on CRAN, namely osmextract and sfnetworks.
            Get the complete curriculum vitae from here.
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Andrea Gilardi

              Gilardi, A., Lovelace, R., Padgham, M. Data structures and methods for reproducible street network analysis: overview and implementations in R. Under review. Preprint.
              Gilardi, A., Mateu, J., Borgoni, R., Lovelace, R., Multivariate hierarchical analysis of car crashes data considering a spatial network lattice. Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series A (Statistics in Society). http://doi.org/10.1111/rssa.12823.
              Borgoni, R., Gilardi, A., & Zappa, D. (2020). Assessing the Risk of Car Crashes in Road Networks. Social Indicators Research, 1-19.https://doi.org/10.1007/s11205-020-02295-x.
